item.title: Ultrasonic Range Sensor on the Raspberry Pi
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Joachim Weise)
item.description: In this project I am interfacing the HC-SR04 ultrasonic sensor module to a Raspberry Pi to measure distance. Later on the Raspberry as well as the sensor will be part of an obstacle avoiding robot. I use my oscilloscope to check whether the sensor is working as announced.
